website_summaries.verdict: The DLO Portable Speakers for the iPhone are great portable speakers that offer excellent sound quality for its size.
pros: The DLO Portable Speakers for iPhone can be disassembled into a compact and portable football-like shape
It also has excellent audio quality, without any sound interference from the iPhone
cons: The DLO Portable Speakers for the iPhone lacks a charging dock, music controls, and is not a very good speaker phone

customer_reviews.title: cute design
customer_reviews.text: Very compact portable speakers for any MP3 player not just the iphone. The sound quality isn't bad for such small, not very hi-tech speakers. It runs on Ac adapter or batteries but haven't tried battery power yet to comment on how quickly or slowly it eats up batteries. I agree with the 2 prior reviews- a place to store the cords would be great as the speakers fit into a small ball already and a charging dock for your MP3 would be helpful. But, a great set of portable speakers for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: CShea

customer_reviews.title: Great, no gsm buzz with iphone, though a bit bulky and could be louder
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the bathroom so I can listen to my iphone while showering and watch news podcasts while at the sink. Most speakers like this don't let the iphone sit horizontally for watching video. It would be better if it could go louder, but it's acceptable for a small room. It's also bigger than I thought, probably too bulky for a messenger bag. Would also be nice if next generation used the dock connector so it can charge the iphone.
customer_reviews.author: Jamshid Afshar

customer_reviews.title: pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: i really didn't know how well these speakers would work. they were a change form the normal ihome product i was accustomed to using. i wasnt sure how full the sound would be, but it was a great purchase. it was much cheaper than the speakers ive had before. the sound is quality - loud and full. they are compatible with any mp3 player, and they are easily transported. i am extremely pleased with my speakers. the only thing you may need to add to your purchase is a charger for your specific mp3 device since this product doesnt charge.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, small size
customer_reviews.text: I bought these speakers for my son-in-law. The sound is great. The size seems perfect for easy transport and storage. He says he uses them in his home office and is very impressed with them. I looked at all kinds of small speakers for iPods and this looked to be the best option. Clearly I was right.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: I received the speakers very quickly. Thank you. The sound is not as good as the reviews said it was but that is not the fault of the seller. I read independent reviews. I have to say though, I saw the exact same speakers at Marshalls for just under $30. I found the wires troublesome when I packed it up. Silly me, they Photoshopped it out of the pictures. Again, not the fault of the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Dazzle Your Eye

customer_reviews.title: Decent Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Speakers are not bad for the price, get loud enough for what I needed just lacking in bass. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Boom--Boom Vibrations
customer_reviews.text: I really like the speakers. They sound great, look good, operate with batteries and electricity. While it is pretty portable I wish the design included somewhere to place the cords to the speakers and the ipod stand.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great iPhone Speakers
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are great for the iPhone. Good sound, small footprint, nice storage size for travel, and they provide a good support for the phone. Probable will be the last speakers I buy for the iPhone and other media players (Archos.,ect )
customer_reviews.author: Gary E. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: My grandson wanted this for his birthday. I ordered it and he is very pleased with how it works. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Ron Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Got this item very fast and was as good as it showed in the picture. Great sound and compact to use for our trip to mexico.
customer_reviews.author: KSGILBERT

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that would make this better would be if the speakers were wireless, as the cords seem to get a bit in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: i tough was new
customer_reviews.text: i ordered one of this speakers at TechUsed its says its new thats why i purchase it but it came in today and its not on the box its open and its missing some stuff like the stand for iphone or ipod and the power cable if ur not using battery.kinda disappointed but all in all fast shipping cheap price i would say its OK
customer_reviews.author: Ronald C. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, blurry sound
customer_reviews.text: I hooked this up to my iPhone, and dismantled it and threw it in a drawer within days. Don't waste your time or money - go ahead and buy a "real" docking station with speakers.
customer_reviews.author: I. Cash

customer_reviews.title: Average at Best
customer_reviews.text: Recap of what others said: Travels well. Wish it would have acted as a charger. Sounds decent (be sure to set iPhone iPod EQ settings to "Portable Speakers"). I use it at work and the speakers are never more than a couple feet from me. Bass seems to come through better at louder volume which kinda stinks for me as I need the volume low. Solid buy for the money but not for audiophiles.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Started making whining/buzzing sounds after only a few months of use- it sounds normal for the first 5 minutes of use, then the whining buzzing sound begins and won't quit until it's been off for a while. Happens with both my iphone and ipod. The sound was average to poor, and in all I would certainly not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Laxidaisy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product but ....
customer_reviews.text: Um yeah ... It's only $20 vs original $50 because the iPhone 6 won't fit in the stand!!! Still works but I wanted to put my 6 in the stand! Oh well my mistake I guess should have checked. I'm giving it to a co-workers kid with a 5.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to the reviews. I got these to use with Iphone in the car as I have an older car and no input jack for the iphone. The speakers went bye bye after about a month. Even at 17 bucks it is a POS. Do not buy this crap. I gave the setup to my 3 year old grand daughter to use while playing.
customer_reviews.author: buck simpson

customer_reviews.title: good speakers, great value
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to find a cheap set of speakers to hook my iphone into for work. I didnt' want a set that charged the phone, or that sync'd music, just something that I could plug in and listen to. for this price, the sound is fine and there have been zero problems with them.
customer_reviews.author: Dangerous Dirk

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Its good for its price. The only problem with it is that it doesnt have volume control and there are just too many wires attached with it. i would presonally prefer an option to attach all three (speaker and base) together when I am just using it at home. I like the quality of the sound it produces.
customer_reviews.author: Mya J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works good, it's a good gift to give someone worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Poop boy

customer_reviews.title: Digital Lifestyle Outfitters Speakers for iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I bought these portable speakers for my adult daughter who travels for her job and needed something compact for air travel. I was impressed at the quality of sound, how it fit together into an "egg" like shape for compact packing/travel, and works by battery or AC plug. We have been very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lois J. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These did not work and I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: DCK

customer_reviews.title: slight buzzing noise when used with my laptop
customer_reviews.text: These plug into the headphone jack on my laptop and work pretty well for boosting the volume. One minor issue is a slight slight buzzing noise that is always present. I kind of mentally tune it out when listening to music, but it's very noticeable when nothing is playing. This could just be a problem with connecting these to a laptop, or even my particular laptop. I haven't used them on an Itunes device.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wolfley

customer_reviews.title: Small that pack a punch
customer_reviews.text: These tiny speakers put off a ton of sound. I use mine with my IPHONE 4 but have used them with my iPod touch and my MP3 player. All sound great with these speakers. And, they are also versatile, I also use them with my portable DVD player when traveling........ the speakers attached to the DVD player can only produce so much sound but, once you plug in the "Outfitters"......... Its in stereo!!! Awesome!!! Strongly recommend for the price you just cant beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Karmella's page

customer_reviews.title: Easy set-up, great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this system, which is extremely easy to set up, works well with our iPhone and has excellent sound quality for music. As noted in other reviews, the speakers work for phone calls, but could be improved for this use...it would be nice if both the iPhone speaker system and the portable speakers had clearer and louder sound for calls. But for the price, this little system is stellar, and we recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rothe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This product far exceeded my expectations, I use it for my iphone, ipod and laptop, it produces excellent quality sound and the batteries last for weeks at a time. Highly recommended !!
customer_reviews.author: Rocco Zappia

product_meta.title: Digital Lifestyle Outfitters DLZ72626,17 Portable Speakers for iPhone -Black
product_meta.description:
Digital Lifestyle Outfitters DLZ72626/17 Portable Speakers for the iPhone. These portable speakers work with anything with a headphone jack, but have been designed specifically with the iPhone in mind. Enjoy iPhone music and videos in room filling stero sound - even turn your iPhone into a speaker phone. Use with batteries to take your speakers everywhere you go, or use at home with the included AC power adapter. Easily combine the portable speakers, cables, and base for compact storage and convenient travel.

AMAZON.COM
Compact and ready to go, Portable Speakers for iPhone let you enjoy your music and videos in stereo sound without mobile phone interference.

Enjoy your music and videos in stereo sound without mobile phone interference. Click to enlarge. 

Holds your iPhone upright or horizontally. 

Snaps into a ball for easy travel. 

Big Sound, Small Package
Featuring an extra-wide sound stage and bass vents, these small speakers pack a powerful punch. 

iPhone Stand
The removable, rotating stand holds your iPhone upright or horizontally for the ideal portable movie-viewing experience. Plus, you don't have to disconnect your iPhone if a call comes in--Portable Speakers simply turn your iPhone into a speaker phone! So while iPhone is connected, you can take and place calls without disruption. 

Ultra-Portable
Small enough for home, office or dorm desktops, their compact design that makes them ideal for travel. Each speaker snaps neatly into the base to create a "ball" approximately 6 inches in diameter. Wrap the cables around the base to keep them secure and out of the way when not in use. 

Powering Options
Power your speakers either with AAA batteries for easy portability, or with the included AC adapter. 

Use With Other Devices
Created with the iPhone in mind, these speakers will also work with any audio device that has a 3.5mm headphone jack. 

What's in the Box
Portable Speaker System, AC Adapter, User's Manual
feature_bullets: Compatible with any audio device with a standard 3.5mm headphone jack
Enjoy iPhone music and videos in stereo sound
Interference-free digital amplifier with special shielding for use with music phones
Two speakers, base and cables easily combine for compact storage and convenient travel
Use with four AAA batteries or the included AC adapter
